II. Purpose of Addendum
Guiding Harbor is a private licensed child placing agency that provides services to
abused and neglected children referred by DHHS. Services include Foster Home
Certification, Foster Care and Independent Living. The agency now requests to
add an adoption program.
III. Methodology
08/14/2018 – Provided face to face consultation regarding licensing rules, DHHS
policies and processes related to Adoption. Assessed agency’s preparedness by
reviewing their newly-developed policies and procedures. Identified areas that were
omitted and those that needed adjustment.
12/05/2018 – Reviewed and approved additions and revisions adoption policies and
procedures. Explained annual audit expectations. Obtained program statement.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Guiding Harbor is prepared to offer the following adoption services to children and
families in Southeastern Michigan: Training, child and family assessments and
recommendations, case management, and referrals for adoption subsidies and post-
adoption services.
V. Recommendation
I recommend Adoption services be added to the existing child placing agency license.
